name: SpyMaster (itch) (mprk)
description:
You are a spy tasked find out sensitive information by exploiting personal information of your targets.

  • Talk to people to find out more about your targets.
  • Pressure your targets into revealing information within the time limit.
  • W, A, S, D to move. Click on dialog options to talk.

Discord username: mprk#9336

What I added to make the game more fun: I think the idea is fun but as this is my first ever game, I don't think it will be a lot of fun.

NOTE: Game is an early prototype created as a submission for a game jam (31st GDL Game Jam).
